template.description: a few examples of extracting from a database and indexing the data into Solr
template.name: hive2solrInpatientsConsumerComplaints

labels.label:
Setup Instructions for the cluster:
sudo ln -s /opt/cloudera/parcels/CDH-7.1.6-1.cdh7.1.6.p0.10506313/lib/solr /usr/lib/ /usr/lib/solr/bin/solrctl.sh instancedir --generate ~/marty/src/solr/marty6collection /usr/lib/solr/bin/solrctl.sh --trace --solr localhost:2181/solr --zk localhost:2181/solr instancedir --create marty6collection ~/marty/src/solr/marty6collection
Then create the collection in the Solr webui

entry.value: myip, unique_id, thread, hostname, sensor_id, c1_l, c2, c3, c4, sensor_ts
